text:
@SpeakerPelosi Stop trying to sneak sht into the Covid19 bill, Nancy.  The American people aren't all wealthy, like you.  We're worried about becoming homeless, and feeding our children, while you play your political games.  Knock it off & Do your d-mn job!  YOU WORK FOR US!

KAG 2020! 🇺🇸
